comment: -Replace Haller with Huell Melon (not in Brewtoad) -Replace Lemon with Meyer Lemon

Split batch into two carboys - one fermented with WLP565, the other with Brux Trois Vrai. Blend and split again, adding Brett C to both, as well as lactose and vanilla bean to one carboy. The other is to remain "plain." Ten days before bottling, add dry hops to both.
